title: Learn ChatGPT and even create your own chatbots with this $14.97 training package
content:
Macworld

Boasting over 25 million daily users, the AI using natural language processing to craft copy that reads like human-written text is already impacting virtually every industry and creative pursuit imaginable. Now, it’s time for you to understand how to use AI to your advantage.

With the instruction from The Complete ChatGPT Artificial Intelligence OpenAI Training Bundle, you’ll not only learn how this world-changing technology works, but also how to use it. You could discover how to create and deploy your own ChatGPT AI bot with this $14.97 course pack.

Across 86 lessons with over 4 hours of instruction, this 4.9-star rated four-course collection delves into ChatGPT, starting with ChatGPT for Beginners. You’ll start with grasping the fundamentals of using ChatGPT and working with it hands-on to generate natural-sounding text. 

In ChatGPT: Artificial Intelligence (AI) that Writes for You, students explore this incredible tool’s nearly infinite practical uses. Then, the tandem courses Create a ChatGPT A.I. Bot with Tkinter and Python and Create a ChatGPT A.I. Bot with Django and Python put your learning to the test as you actually make web apps and even build a cool coding website that connects to ChatGPT.

Until September 30 at 11:59pm Pacific, grab The Complete ChatGPT Artificial Intelligence OpenAI Training Bundle for just $14.97.
